嶱字的基本解释

嶱
kě
〔嶱嵑（
k?）〕（山）高峻，如“其山则崆??嶱嶱。”

嶱
jié
古同“碣”，碑石。

嶱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kě］
［《集韻》丘葛切，入曷，溪。］
(1)见“嶱嵑”。
(2)见“嶱”。

嶱字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶱； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页321第03
【五音集韻】苦曷切【集韻】丘葛切，?音渴。嶱嵑，山貌。　又山石高峻貌。【張衡·南都賦】其山則崆㟅嶱嵑。【杜甫·詠懷詩】樂動殷樛嶱。【正字通】或作膠轕。義同。○按《玉篇》嶱同嵑。而張賦嶱嵑字連用，又似非同音者。《正字通》改古曷切，音葛，與轕通用。似亦可从。

考證：〔【張衡·南都賦】其山則崆㟅嶱嵑。又按玉篇，嶱同嵑。而揚賦嶱嵑字連用，又似非同音者。〕　謹按前註所引是張衡南都賦，此處揚賦應作張賦，揚改張。
嶱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嶱字的起名意思

暂无。

嶱
Basic explanation of words
嶱
kě
〔嶱嵑（
k?)] (Mountain) is high and steep, such as "The mountain is so wide."
嶱
jié
The ancient "Jie", the stele.
嶱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kě]
["Jiyun" Qiu Ge cuts, enters, and brooks. ]
(1) See "嶱嵑".
(2) See "嶱".
嶱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶱; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 321 03
[Pentatonic Jiyun] bitter cut [Jiyun] Qiu Ge cut, sound thirsty.嶱嵑, mountain appearance.　The mountains and rocks are high and majestic. 【Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu】The mountain is 崆㟅嶱嵑. 【Du Fu·Yonghuai Poems】Music and dynamic Yin Xunzhen. [Zhengzitong] Or as a glue joint. The same meaning. ○ Press the "Jade Pian" with the same 嶱嵑. And Zhang Fu 嶱嵑 used together, but also seems to be non-homonymous. "Zhengzitong" has been changed to Gu Naqi, Yin Ge, and it is common with Qi. It seems to be from. Textual research: [[Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu] The mountain is the 崆㟅嶱嵑. According to the jade article, 嶱同嵑. The use of the word Yang Fu 嶱嵑 together seems to be non-homonymous. 〕 　 I would like to refer to Zhang Heng’s Nandu Fu as quoted in the previous note. Here, Yang Fu should be Zhang Fu and Yang changed to Zhang.
